welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Hazel Dell, USA! Get ready to experience the city's quaint streets, friendly locals, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to immerse yourself in the rich culture and explore all that Hazel Dell has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse serves Alaska Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves Delta Air Lines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: This concourse serves Southwest Airlines and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Troutdale Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for cargo and general aviation flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
